title: Ranger Spells
content: Transmutation ActionLevel 3 Spell Slot Make weeds burst from the ground and smother the area. Creatures moving through the weeds have their Movement Speed quartered.18m 6m Protection from Energy Lv 3 Abjuration ActionLevel 3 Spell Slot Touch a creature to grant it Resistance to Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Thunder damage.Melee Concentration Goodberry Lv 1 Transmutation ActionLevel 1 Spell Slot 4~16 Healing 4d4Conjure four magical berries into your or a companion's inventory.
